New Records: Dawid Malan's 140 is his highest ODI score and the same as his highest Test score.
Joe Root surpassed Graham Gooch to become England’s all-time highest scorer at World Cups.
Key Match Events: Dawid Malan scored 140 runs off 107 balls, including five sixes and 16 fours.
Reece Topley took four wickets for 43 runs.
Reece Topley dismissed Tanzid Hasan and Najmul Hossain Shanto with successive deliveries.
Reece Topley took the key wickets of Shakib Al Hasan and Mushfiqur Rahim.
Mark Wood bowled with sustained pace, conceding 29 runs from his 10 overs and taking the wicket of Shoriful Islam.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A violent storm occurred shortly before midnight on the eve of the match.
England's total score was 364 for nine.
Chris Woakes's efforts with the new ball were expensive, conceding 34 runs in his first four overs.
England's middle order proved feeble despite the top order's strong performance.
